## Learning Outcomes {.ch}

After completing Class 24 you should...

* Know the definition/defining equation for underspecified system, constraint, commodity/specialty chemical
* Understand
    * situational advantages and disadvantages ideal reactors
    * levels of design
    * factors that affect the economics of reactor operation
* Be able to articulate a design strategy
